casebody.data:
No. 10-1162. Polina Gertskis, Petitioner v. New York City Department of Health and Mental Hygiene, et al. 563 U.S. 1021, 131 S. Ct. 2932,

180 L. Ed. 2d 225,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4062. May 31, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

Same case below, 375 Fed. Appx. 138.
